mapper.insert: insert into users (Id, Username, Password, IsLockout, LastLoginTime, LastLoginIp, PsdWrongTime, LockTime, CreateTime, Telephone) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{islockout,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psdwrongtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update users
Username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsLockout = #{islockout,jdbcType=CHAR},
LastLoginTime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LastLoginIp = #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PsdWrongTime = #{psdwrongtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LockTime = #{locktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update users set Username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsLockout = #{islockout,jdbcType=CHAR}, LastLoginTime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LastLoginIp = #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PsdWrongTime = #{psdwrongtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LockTime = #{locktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE users SET LastLoginTime = #{time} , LastLoginIp = #{ip} WHERE Id = #{id}
